segments.text: I am utterly dumbfounded by the lack of awareness in this room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the sink; it's a waterfall in their kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading onto the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And this woman, she's just calmly drying a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in a growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so completely oblivious to their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so frustrated to see such a clear hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are engaged in their own little drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is practically inviting disaster on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's plundering the cookie jar right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just as complicit, waiting expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire household seems to exist in separate realities.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's maddening how close they are to several accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and point out the obvious!
segments.speaker: PAR
